short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion extension for the Robust Theme Framework.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Companion extension for the Robust Theme Framework - A Kajabi Theme. 
The extension modifies Kajabiâ€™s Theme Editor to allow a more friendly customization of the Robust Theme Framework.

Main Features:
- Drag and Drop blocks into columns.
- CSS Widget - Add CSS rules to your sections and blocks.
- Save and Load Sections and blocks Presets. 
- Manage Container Elements
